projects.title: Open Care
projects.description: Comprehensive healthcare ecosystem connecting patients, providers, and health facilities
projects.problem: Healthcare in Nigeria lacks integrated systems for appointment scheduling, medical records, and facility discovery
projects.solution: Built a multi-sided platform with patient portals, provider dashboards, and facility management

projects.title: Election Management System
projects.description: Secure digital system for managing electoral processes and results
projects.problem: Manual election management processes prone to errors and delays
projects.solution: Built secure platform for voter registration, result collation, and real-time reporting

projects.title: News & Content Platform
projects.description: Modern content management system for news organizations
projects.problem: Legacy CMS platforms lack modern publishing workflows and mobile optimization
projects.solution: Built custom CMS with editorial workflow, multimedia support, and responsive delivery

projects.title: Alumni Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive platform for alumni engagement and institutional fundraising
projects.problem: Universities struggle to maintain alumni connections and manage giving programs
projects.solution: Built integrated platform for member profiles, events, donations, and communication
